patterns: Hi

responses: Hello! How can I help you today?
Hi there! What can I do for you?
Greetings! How may I assist you?
Hello! What brings you here today?

See you soon! Come back anytime.
Farewell! It was nice chatting with you.
Until next time! Take care.

I appreciate it
Thanks for your help

responses: You're welcome!
Happy to help!
My pleasure!
Anytime! Let me know if you need anything else.

patterns: What is my account balance?
How much do I have in my account?
Check my account balance
Balance of my savings account
Tell me my current account balance
responses: I can't provide your balance directly, but you can check your account balance by logging into your bank's online portal or mobile app. Would you like guidance on how to do that?

patterns: What are the banking hours for [Bank Name]?
When does [Bank Name] close today?
Tell me the working hours of the bank
Bank opening hours for [Bank Name]
What time does [Bank Name] open on weekends?
responses: The banking hours for [Bank Name] are typically from 9 AM to 3 PM on weekdays. However, I recommend checking the official website or calling the branch directly for the most accurate information, especially during holidays.

patterns: What are the loan options at [Bank Name]?
Can you tell me about home loans?
I need information about personal loans.
How can I apply for a loan at [Bank Name]?
What is the interest rate for loans at [Bank Name]?
responses: For detailed information on loans, including eligibility and interest rates, please visit [Bank Name]'s website or contact the loan department directly. Would you like the contact number for the loan department?

patterns: Where can I find ATMs of [Bank Name]?
Find the nearest ATM to my location.
Where is the closest ATM?
Are there any ATMs in [City Name]?
I need to know the ATM locations for [Bank Name].
responses: You can use the ATM locator feature on [Bank Name]'s website or app to find the nearest ATM. Would you like me to guide you through it?

patterns: How can I open a bank account at [Bank Name]?
What documents do I need to open an account?
Tell me about the account opening procedure at [Bank Name].
Can I open a savings account at [Bank Name]?
What are the requirements to open a new account?
responses: To open a new account at [Bank Name], you will typically need proof of identity (such as a National ID or passport), proof of address, and an initial deposit. Please visit [Bank Name]'s branch or their website for detailed instructions on account opening.

patterns: Can I see my recent transactions?
Show me my transaction history.
What transactions have I made recently?
How do I check my last 5 transactions?
Tell me my transaction history for this month.
responses: You can check your recent transactions by logging into your bank’s online portal or mobile app. If you need assistance with accessing this information, I can guide you through the process.

patterns: What is the eligibility for a credit card?
Tell me about the benefits of having a credit card with [Bank Name].
How can I apply for a credit card?
What is the interest rate for credit cards?
How do I pay my credit card bill?
responses: To apply for a credit card with [Bank Name], you can visit a branch or apply online. For more detailed information on eligibility, interest rates, and features, please visit [Bank Name]'s official website.

patterns: Where is the nearest branch of [Bank Name]?
Find me the address of [Bank Name] branches.
List all [Bank Name] branches in Colombo.
Is there a [Bank Name] branch near me?
Where can I find a branch of [Bank Name] in Kandy?
responses: You can check the nearest branches using the branch locator on [Bank Name]'s website or app. Would you like me to guide you on how to use it?

patterns: What are the exchange rates for USD to LKR?
How much is 1 USD in Sri Lankan Rupees?
Can you tell me the current exchange rate for [Currency]?
What’s the rate for Euro to Sri Lankan Rupees today?
How do I get the best currency exchange rate?
responses: For the most accurate and up-to-date exchange rates, please visit [Bank Name]’s currency exchange page or call their branch directly. Exchange rates can vary depending on the branch.

patterns: How can I close my account?
I want to close my savings account.
What do I need to do to close my account?
Can I close my account online?
What is the process for account closure?
responses: To close your account, you will need to visit your branch with valid identification and fill out an account closure form. You may also need to clear any outstanding balances or fees. Contact your bank for further instructions.

patterns: How do I make a deposit?
Can I deposit money through the ATM?
What types of deposits are available?
How do I deposit money into my account?
Is there a deposit machine at my branch?
responses: You can deposit money through the bank's ATMs, deposit machines, or at the branch counter. For detailed instructions, please check [Bank Name]'s website or contact your nearest branch.

patterns: How can I process a cheque?
Can I deposit a cheque through an ATM?
What is the cheque clearing time?
How do I issue a cheque?
Tell me about the process for cheque payments.
responses: To process a cheque, you can submit it at a branch or through the bank's cheque deposit machine (if available). For cheque clearing times and other details, please contact [Bank Name] or visit their website.

patterns: What are the transaction limits for my account?
How much can I transfer in a day?
What is the limit for online transactions?
Tell me about the withdrawal limits for my account.
How much can I transfer using mobile banking?
responses: Transaction limits may vary depending on your account type and banking services. Please check the official [Bank Name] website or contact customer support to get the exact limits for your account.

patterns: How do I use mobile banking?
Tell me about the features of [Bank Name]'s mobile app.
How can I activate mobile banking?
Can I check my balance using mobile banking?
How do I reset my mobile banking password?
responses: You can access mobile banking through [Bank Name]'s mobile app, available on the App Store or Google Play. For activation and login support, visit the app's help section or contact customer support.

patterns: I think my ATM card was stolen.
What should I do if I lose my ATM card?
I’ve noticed fraudulent activity on my ATM card.
What should I do if my ATM transaction is not completed?
How can I block my ATM card?
responses: If you suspect fraud or have lost your ATM card, immediately contact [Bank Name] customer support or visit a branch to block your card. You may also be able to block it via mobile banking or online banking services.

patterns: What is the interest rate for savings accounts?
Tell me about the interest rates for fixed deposits.
How much interest do I get on my account balance?
What is the current interest rate for loans?
How do interest rates work on savings accounts?
responses: Interest rates depend on the type of account and the specific terms of your banking product. For current rates, please visit [Bank Name]’s website or contact customer service.

patterns: How do I activate my debit card?
Tell me how to use my debit card.
Is there any fee for activating my debit card?
Can I activate my debit card online?
What should I do to activate my new debit card?
responses: To activate your debit card, you can do so through [Bank Name]'s mobile app, internet banking, or by visiting your nearest branch. Please check the card's instruction manual for specific steps.

patterns: How can I update my address?
I need to change my phone number on my account.
How do I update my personal details in the bank?
Can I change my account information online?

responses: To update your personal details, you can visit your nearest branch or log in to your online banking account. For mobile banking updates, please use the app's settings section.

patterns: How can I exchange foreign currency at [Bank Name]?

Can I exchange currency at any branch?
What documents do I need for currency exchange?
responses: You can exchange foreign currency at most [Bank Name] branches. You may need to present a valid ID and other documents for certain transactions. For detailed instructions, contact your nearest branch.

patterns: How do I log in to online banking?
I forgot my online banking password.
How do I reset my online banking account?
What should I do if I can't access online banking?
Tell me how to use online banking for bill payments.
responses: To access online banking, visit [Bank Name]’s website or use their mobile app. For login issues or password recovery, follow the instructions on the website or contact customer service.

patterns: Where is the nearest branch?
Tell me the address of the nearest [Bank Name] branch.
How can I find [Bank Name]'s branches near me?
Where can I locate an ATM for [Bank Name]?
Give me directions to the nearest [Bank Name] branch.
responses: You can find the nearest [Bank Name] branch or ATM using our branch locator tool on the [Bank Name] website or mobile app. Alternatively, you can contact customer service for help.

patterns: What are the bank holidays for this year?
When is the next bank holiday?
Is the bank open on public holidays?

responses: You can view [Bank Name]'s list of bank holidays on our website or contact the branch for more details. Our branches and ATMs will be closed on public holidays.

patterns: How can I apply for a loan?
Tell me about the loan application process.

What is the interest rate for loans?
responses: To apply for a loan, please visit [Bank Name]'s website or a nearby branch. For a personal loan, you will need to submit your ID, proof of income, and other documents. For specific loan types, kindly contact the bank or check the website.

patterns: How can I close my bank account?
What do I need to do to close my account?
Can I close my account online?
How long does it take to close my account?
Is there any fee to close my account?
responses: To close your account, please visit your nearest [Bank Name] branch. Make sure all pending transactions are cleared. Some accounts may have a closure fee depending on the terms of the account.

patterns: How do I replace my lost credit card?
I need to replace my debit card.

Can I request a new ATM card online?

responses: To replace your lost or damaged card, contact [Bank Name] customer service or visit the nearest branch. You can also request a new card through the mobile app or online banking.

patterns: How do I pay my utility bills through the bank?
Can I pay my electricity bill through mobile banking?
What bill payment services are available?
Tell me how to pay my phone bill online.

responses: You can pay utility bills like electricity, water, and phone bills through [Bank Name]'s mobile banking or online banking platform. Simply log in and select the 'Bill Payment' option. If you need further assistance, contact customer support.

patterns: How can I check my credit score?
Do you offer credit score services?
What is my current credit score?
Tell me how to improve my credit score.

responses: You can check your credit score through [Bank Name]'s online banking or by contacting the bank's customer service. For advice on improving your score, speak with a financial advisor.

patterns: What are the monthly fees for my savings account?

Tell me about the fees for international transfers.
What are the hidden fees for online transactions?
How can I avoid service charges on my account?
responses: Banking fees vary depending on your account type and the services you use. You can find detailed information about fees on [Bank Name]'s website or by contacting customer service.

patterns: I cannot complete my online transfer.
Why is my online transfer failing?

Tell me why my transfer to another bank is not working.
What should I do if my online transfer was unsuccessful?
responses: If you are facing issues with an online transfer, please check your account balance, recipient details, and internet connection. If the problem persists, contact [Bank Name]'s customer support for assistance.

I want to report an issue with the mobile app.

responses: You can submit feedback about the mobile app by visiting the 'Feedback' section in the app settings or by contacting customer support. We appreciate your input to improve the app experience.

responses: To check your account balance, you can use [Bank Name]'s mobile banking app, online banking platform, or visit any ATM. You can also check your balance by calling customer service.

responses: You can check the latest exchange rates on [Bank Name]'s website or mobile app. Foreign currency exchange is available at select branches. Contact your nearest branch for more details.

responses: To log into online banking, visit [Bank Name]'s online portal and enter your credentials. If you've forgotten your password or have trouble logging in, click on 'Forgot Password' to reset it or contact customer service.

How much can I withdraw from an ATM in one day?

responses: The ATM withdrawal limit depends on your account type. Please check your bank's terms or contact customer service for information on increasing your withdrawal limit.

responses: Interest rates for savings accounts, fixed deposits, and loans vary. You can find the latest rates on [Bank Name]'s website or by contacting customer service. Rates may change based on the market.

patterns: How do I know if I am eligible for a credit card?
What are the requirements for a credit card?
Can I apply for a credit card online?
Tell me about the eligibility criteria for a [Bank Name] credit card.
What documents do I need to apply for a credit card?
responses: To be eligible for a credit card, you must meet certain income and age requirements. You will need to submit documents such as proof of income, identity, and residence. Apply online through our website or visit a branch for more details.

Can I view my bank statement online?

responses: You can view and download your account statement through [Bank Name]'s online banking or mobile app. You can also request a paper statement by visiting a branch or contacting customer service.

Tell me how to report a fraud case.
responses: If you suspect fraud on your account, immediately contact [Bank Name] customer service or visit a branch. We will help secure your account and investigate any suspicious activity.

patterns: Do you offer overdraft protection?
How do I sign up for overdraft protection?

Can I protect my account from overdraft fees?
How does overdraft protection work?
responses: Yes, [Bank Name] offers overdraft protection on eligible accounts. You can sign up for it through our mobile app, online banking, or by visiting a branch. The overdraft limit depends on your account type.

Tell me how to sign up for mobile banking.

responses: To register for mobile banking, download the [Bank Name] mobile banking app and follow the instructions to create your account. You can also register through online banking or by visiting a branch.

patterns: How do I apply for a personal loan?
Tell me the loan application process.

responses: To apply for a loan, visit [Bank Name]'s website or mobile banking app to start the application process. Alternatively, you can apply by visiting a branch. You will need to submit documents like proof of income, identity, and address.

patterns: Where is the nearest branch?
Tell me the location of the nearest [Bank Name] branch.

Where can I visit your branches?
What are the addresses of your branches?
responses: You can find the nearest branch by visiting [Bank Name]'s website or using the mobile banking app. Alternatively, you can contact customer service for branch locations.

patterns: How do I view my transaction history?
Tell me how to check recent transactions.
Can I see my transaction history online?
How can I download my transaction history?
What are the steps to view my transaction details?
responses: To view your transaction history, log into your online banking or mobile banking account. You can also request a printed transaction history at your nearest branch.

patterns: Can I upgrade my savings account?
How do I upgrade my account to a premium account?

responses: To upgrade your account, you can visit any [Bank Name] branch or contact customer service. They will guide you through the available options based on your account type.

patterns: What is my debit card withdrawal limit?
How much can I withdraw using my debit card?

Tell me the daily limit for debit card withdrawals.
What are the limits for card transactions?
responses: The debit card withdrawal limit depends on your account type and bank policies. You can check your limit through the mobile banking app, or contact customer service for assistance.

patterns: What are your banking hours?
When are your branches open?
Tell me the working hours of [Bank Name].
What time do your branches close?
When does the bank open and close on weekdays?
responses: Our branch hours are typically from 9 AM to 4 PM, Monday to Friday. Some branches may operate on Saturdays. For specific branch timings, please visit [Bank Name]'s website or contact customer service.

patterns: How do I send a wire transfer?
Tell me the procedure for a wire transfer.
What information do I need to make a wire transfer?
Can I send money internationally with wire transfer?
How long does a wire transfer take?
responses: To send a wire transfer, you need to provide the recipient's bank account details, including their name, account number, and branch information. You can initiate wire transfers through online banking or at a branch. The time for processing depends on the destination.

patterns: Where is the nearest ATM?
Tell me the location of an ATM near me.
How do I find an ATM for [Bank Name]?
Is there an ATM near my location?
What is the closest ATM I can use?
responses: You can find the nearest ATM by using the [Bank Name] ATM locator on our website or mobile app. Alternatively, you can contact customer service for nearby ATM locations.

patterns: How do I close my bank account?
What is the process for terminating my account?
Can I close my account online?
Tell me how to end my banking relationship with [Bank Name].
How can I cancel my account?
responses: To close your account, please visit any [Bank Name] branch and request account termination. Ensure that all pending transactions are completed, and all dues are settled. You will also need to provide identification for verification.

patterns: What are the current interest rates for savings accounts?
Can you tell me the interest rates for fixed deposits?
What is the interest rate on loans?
How much interest will I earn on my savings?
What are the current rates for home loans?
responses: You can view the current interest rates on our website or mobile banking app. Alternatively, you can contact our customer service for detailed information about interest rates for different accounts and loans.

patterns: How can I order new cheques?
Tell me how to request cheques.
Can I order cheques online?
How do I book a cheque book?
I need a new cheque book, how can I get one?
responses: To order a cheque book, log into your online banking account, go to the 'Cheque Book Request' section, and place an order. You can also request a cheque book through mobile banking or by visiting a branch.

patterns: How do I make an online payment?
Can I pay my bills online through the bank?
What online payment services are available?
Tell me how to pay my utilities using online banking.
How do I pay for goods online with my bank account?
responses: You can make online payments through your mobile banking app or online banking. Simply go to the payments section, select the bill or service you wish to pay, and enter the required details.

patterns: What is the current exchange rate for USD?
Can I exchange currency at your bank?
How much is 1 USD in Sri Lankan Rupees?
Tell me the exchange rates for foreign currencies.
Do you offer currency exchange services?
responses: You can find the current exchange rates for various currencies on our website or mobile banking app. You can also visit our branches for currency exchange services.

patterns: How do I freeze my account?
Can I freeze my bank account temporarily?
I think my account has been compromised, how can I freeze it?
Tell me how to lock my account.
How do I prevent unauthorized access to my account?
responses: To freeze your account, please contact customer service immediately. You can also lock your account temporarily through your mobile banking app or online banking if you suspect any suspicious activity.

patterns: How do I recover my online banking account?
I forgot my online banking password, what should I do?
Tell me how to reset my account password.
Can I recover my account if I lost access?
What should I do if I cannot access my account?
responses: If you have forgotten your password, you can reset it by clicking on 'Forgot Password' on the login page of online banking or the mobile banking app. You will need to follow the recovery process and provide identification for verification.

patterns: How can I protect myself from bank fraud?
What are the tips for avoiding banking fraud?
How do I prevent online banking fraud?
Tell me how to stay safe from fraud in banking.
What should I do if I suspect fraud on my account?
responses: To prevent fraud, avoid sharing your PIN, password, or any personal banking information. Regularly monitor your account activity for unusual transactions and use two-factor authentication where available. If you suspect fraud, immediately contact customer service.

patterns: How do I replace my lost debit card?
I need a new credit card, how can I get one?
Tell me the procedure to replace a damaged card.
My card was stolen, what should I do?
Can I get a new debit card online?
responses: If you have lost or damaged your card, please contact customer service immediately. You can request a replacement card through your mobile banking app, online banking, or by visiting a branch.

patterns: Where can I find the terms and conditions for my bank account?

What are the conditions for having a fixed deposit account?

responses: You can find the full terms and conditions for all bank accounts on our website or by reading the documents provided when opening the account. Please contact customer service if you need further clarification.

patterns: How can I get a bank account statement?
Can I download my statement online?

responses: To get your bank account statement, log into your online banking or mobile banking app. You can download or print the statement directly from the 'Statements' section.

patterns: How can I check if I'm eligible for a loan?
What are the criteria for getting a loan?

responses: You can check your loan eligibility by visiting our website or using the loan eligibility tool available in the mobile banking app. Alternatively, you can contact our customer service to discuss your options.

responses: You can find the nearest branch by visiting the 'Branch Locator' section on our website or mobile app. Alternatively, you can call our customer service for assistance.

responses: You can apply for a credit card through our website or mobile app. Simply fill out the application form, upload the necessary documents, and submit your application for review.

patterns: How do I register for mobile banking?
What is the process to sign up for mobile banking?
Can I register for mobile banking online?
How can I start using mobile banking?

responses: To register for mobile banking, download our mobile app, then follow the registration process by entering your account details and completing the verification steps.

patterns: How do I reset my ATM pin?
I forgot my ATM pin, how can I recover it?
Can I change my ATM pin online?
How do I reset the pin for my debit card?
What should I do if I can't remember my ATM pin?
responses: To reset your ATM pin, visit any ATM or use your mobile banking app to request a pin change. Alternatively, you can contact customer service for assistance.

patterns: What are the loan repayment options available?
How do I pay off my loan?
Can I make partial payments on my loan?
Tell me how to set up automatic loan payments.
What are the different ways to repay my loan?
responses: You can make loan repayments through online banking, mobile banking, or by visiting a branch. You can also set up automatic payments from your account to ensure timely payments.

patterns: How can I pay my utility bills through the bank?
Can I pay my phone bill using online banking?

Can I schedule bill payments in advance?
What types of bills can I pay through the bank?
responses: You can pay your utility bills through our mobile banking app or online banking. Simply navigate to the 'Bill Payment' section and select the type of bill you want to pay.

patterns: What types of accounts do you offer?
Tell me about your savings account options.
What is the difference between a checking account and a savings account?
What types of business accounts do you provide?
Can you tell me more about your fixed deposit accounts?
responses: We offer various types of accounts, including savings accounts, checking accounts, fixed deposits, and business accounts. You can find detailed information about each account type on our website or by contacting customer service.

patterns: What is overdraft protection?
How can I set up overdraft protection for my account?
Can I link my savings account for overdraft protection?
Tell me how to avoid overdraft fees.
What are the charges for overdraft protection?
responses: Overdraft protection allows you to avoid fees when your checking account balance falls below zero. You can set it up by linking your savings account or applying for an overdraft protection service through your mobile banking app or at a branch.

patterns: What are the benefits of having a debit card?
Do you offer any rewards for using credit cards?
Tell me about the offers available on credit cards.
Are there any discounts for using my bank card?
What rewards can I earn with my bank card?
responses: We offer various benefits and offers for credit and debit cardholders, such as cashbacks, discounts at selected merchants, and loyalty points. You can find more details about our card offers on the 'Card Benefits' section of our website.

patterns: How can I request a cheque book?
I need a new cheque book

What is the process to apply for a cheque book?

responses: You can request a cheque book through your online banking, mobile app, or by visiting the nearest branch. Once processed, it will be delivered to your registered address or held for pickup.

responses: You can subscribe to e-statements via our mobile or online banking. Enable email delivery under your account settings to receive regular PDF statements.

responses: To close your account, please visit your branch with a valid ID and complete the closure form. Note that any pending dues must be cleared before closure.

responses: We offer a range of fixed deposit options with competitive interest rates. Visit our website or speak to a representative for the latest plans and terms.

patterns: How can I track an international transfer?

responses: You can track your remittance using your transaction reference number via our website or by calling our remittance desk. Timelines vary based on destination and method.

patterns: Do you provide safe deposit lockers?

responses: Yes, we offer safe deposit lockers at selected branches. You can apply by visiting the branch with valid documents. Availability may vary by location.

patterns: Give me your customer service number

responses: You can reach our 24/7 customer service hotline at +94 XXX XXX XXX or email us at support@yourbank.lk. Full contact details are on our official website.

patterns: What are co-branded credit cards?

patterns: How can I register for SMS banking?

responses: SMS Banking lets you check balances, receive alerts, and perform quick actions. To activate, register your mobile number at a branch or via mobile banking.

patterns: Do you support green banking?

responses: We actively promote green banking with paperless services, digital receipts, e-statements, and environmentally friendly practices across branches.

patterns: Can I recharge my mobile through the bank?

responses: Yes, you can top up your mobile using our mobile app or online banking. We support all major networks in Sri Lanka including Dialog, Mobitel, Hutch, and Airtel.

patterns: Can I do transactions without my NIC?

responses: Transactions generally require NIC. However, passports, driving licenses, or other approved government-issued IDs may be accepted in some cases. Please contact your branch for details.

patterns: Can I pay electricity bill online?

patterns: Do you offer loans for farmers?

responses: We support startups and SMEs with business loan products. You’ll need a business plan, ID, and relevant documents. Visit your branch or contact our SME support team for guidance.
